desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force pushes toward the bunker where Hoshino is being held captive.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force pushes toward the bunker where Hoshino is being held captive.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force pushes toward the bunker where Hoshino is being held captive.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force pushes toward the bunker where Hoshino is being held captive.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會朝着星野被俘虏的堡垒前进。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会朝着星野被俘虏的堡垒前进。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会朝着星野被俘虏的堡垒前进。

desc.en: After a long hard-fought battle, the Foreclosure Task Force finally brings Hoshino back to safety.
desc.jp: After a long hard-fought battle, the Foreclosure Task Force finally brings Hoshino back to safety.
desc.thai: After a long hard-fought battle, the Foreclosure Task Force finally brings Hoshino back to safety.
desc.ko: After a long hard-fought battle, the Foreclosure Task Force finally brings Hoshino back to safety.
desc.zh_tw: 经过漫长的战斗，對策委員會顺利成功救出星野。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 经过漫长的战斗，对策委员会顺利成功救出星野。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 经过漫长的战斗，对策委员会顺利成功救出星野。

desc.en: Just when everyone thinks they had got rid of PMC, the director suddenly stands in front of them. The director expresses great regret and displeasure at the failure of the plan. Everyone begins engaging again.
desc.jp: Just when everyone thinks they had got rid of PMC, the director suddenly stands in front of them. The director expresses great regret and displeasure at the failure of the plan. Everyone begins engaging again.
desc.thai: Just when everyone thinks they had got rid of PMC, the director suddenly stands in front of them. The director expresses great regret and displeasure at the failure of the plan. Everyone begins engaging again.
desc.ko: Just when everyone thinks they had got rid of PMC, the director suddenly stands in front of them. The director expresses great regret and displeasure at the failure of the plan. Everyone begins engaging again.
desc.zh_tw: 就在對策委員會众人以为甩开PMC时，PMC理事突然又挡在他们面前。理事对计划泡汤表示非常可惜和不快，众人立刻开始战斗。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在对策委员会众人以为甩开PMC时，PMC理事突然又挡在他们面前。理事对计划泡汤表示非常可惜和不快，众人立刻开始战斗。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在对策委员会众人以为甩开PMC时，PMC理事突然又挡在他们面前。理事对计划泡汤表示非常可惜和不快，众人立刻开始战斗。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.thai: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Yume remembered the first time when she saw Hoshino. She praised for Hoshino's cuteness and the ability of being physically strong, and said it was like a dream to be able to meet her - it was, utterly, a miracle. Hoshino didn't think that "daily lives" could be entitled with "miracles", but Senpai denied her opinion.
desc.jp: Yume remembered the first time when she saw Hoshino. She praised for Hoshino's cuteness and the ability of being physically strong, and said it was like a dream to be able to meet her - it was, utterly, a miracle. Hoshino didn't think that "daily lives" could be entitled with "miracles", but Senpai denied her opinion.
desc.thai: Yume remembered the first time when she saw Hoshino. She praised for Hoshino's cuteness and the ability of being physically strong, and said it was like a dream to be able to meet her - it was, utterly, a miracle. Hoshino didn't think that "daily lives" could be entitled with "miracles", but Senpai denied her opinion.
desc.ko: Yume remembered the first time when she saw Hoshino. She praised for Hoshino's cuteness and the ability of being physically strong, and said it was like a dream to be able to meet her - it was, utterly, a miracle. Hoshino didn't think that "daily lives" could be entitled with "miracles", but Senpai denied her opinion.
desc.zh_tw: 梦前辈回忆起自己第一次见到星野时的样子。她称赞星野可爱而坚强，说遇到她就像梦一样——这着实是一场奇迹。星野并不认为日常可以被称作为“奇迹”，但前辈否认了她的说法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 梦前辈回忆起自己第一次见到星野时的样子。她称赞星野可爱而坚强，说遇到她就像梦一样——这着实是一场奇迹。星野并不认为日常可以被称作为“奇迹”，但前辈否认了她的说法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 梦前辈回忆起自己第一次见到星野时的样子。她称赞星野可爱而坚强，说遇到她就像梦一样——这着实是一场奇迹。星野并不认为日常可以被称作为“奇迹”，但前辈否认了她的说法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 梦前辈回忆起自己第一次见到星野时的样子。她称赞星野可爱而坚强，说遇到她就像梦一样——这着实是一场奇迹。星野并不认为日常可以被称作为“奇迹”，但前辈否认了她的说法。

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.jp: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.thai: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.ko: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.zh_tw: 夢是阿拜多斯前學生會的主席。她曾與星野一起工作，對未來抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一張與星野一起拍的合照上出現過。當前沒有更多關於她的訊息，但有些人認為她可能已經死了，如在第一篇和最終篇中所呈現的一樣。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force forces the door open. Head buzzing, Hoshino doesn't know whether it is dream or reality for her to be able to regain freedom and to hear everyone's voice.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force forces the door open. Head buzzing, Hoshino doesn't know whether it is dream or reality for her to be able to regain freedom and to hear everyone's voice.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force forces the door open. Head buzzing, Hoshino doesn't know whether it is dream or reality for her to be able to regain freedom and to hear everyone's voice.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force forces the door open. Head buzzing, Hoshino doesn't know whether it is dream or reality for her to be able to regain freedom and to hear everyone's voice.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會一行人在外面强行打开了门。星野意识模糊，不知自己的自由和大家的声音是梦还是现实。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会一行人在外面强行打开了门。星野意识模糊，不知自己的自由和大家的声音是梦还是现实。

desc.en: In front of Hoshino, there is everyone of the Foreclosure Task Force. Everyone welcomes Hoshino, and Hoshino welcomes everyone. And of course, at the end of the day, Hoshino spoke that line of speech: "I am back."
desc.jp: In front of Hoshino, there is everyone of the Foreclosure Task Force. Everyone welcomes Hoshino, and Hoshino welcomes everyone. And of course, at the end of the day, Hoshino spoke that line of speech: "I am back."
desc.thai: In front of Hoshino, there is everyone of the Foreclosure Task Force. Everyone welcomes Hoshino, and Hoshino welcomes everyone. And of course, at the end of the day, Hoshino spoke that line of speech: "I am back."
desc.ko: In front of Hoshino, there is everyone of the Foreclosure Task Force. Everyone welcomes Hoshino, and Hoshino welcomes everyone. And of course, at the end of the day, Hoshino spoke that line of speech: "I am back."
desc.zh_tw: 星野面前站着的是對策委員會的大家。大家与星野相互欢迎着，而最终星野也说出了那句台词：“我——回——来——了——”
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野面前站着的是对策委员会的大家。大家与星野相互欢迎着，而最终星野也说出了那句台词：“我——回——来——了——”

desc.en: With Hoshino's return, everything finally becomes normal.
desc.jp: With Hoshino's return, everything finally becomes normal.
desc.thai: With Hoshino's return, everything finally becomes normal.
desc.ko: With Hoshino's return, everything finally becomes normal.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野回归后，一切如常。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野回归后，一切如常。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野回归后，一切如常。

desc.en: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
desc.jp: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
desc.thai: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
desc.ko: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
desc.zh_cn: 《目标为爱》（Target For Love）是蔚蓝档案国际服于开服一周年官方发行的一首单曲，配有英文歌词。本曲在游戏内外均有使用。
desc.zh_tw: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.

desc.en: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.jp: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.thai: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.ko: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.zh_tw: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏萊社团室。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往沙勒社团室。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.thai: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.ko: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_tw: 琳是聯邦學生會的副會長，在新手教程以及終章中出現過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.jp: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.thai: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.ko: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.zh_tw: 在招待室里，来自千年的優香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏萊；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在招待室里，来自千禧年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及歌赫娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达沙勒；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.thai: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.ko: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
desc.jp: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
desc.thai: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
desc.ko: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
desc.zh_cn: 《目标为爱》（Target For Love）是蔚蓝档案国际服于开服一周年官方发行的一首单曲，配有英文歌词。本曲在游戏内外均有使用。
desc.zh_tw: Target For Love is a single officially released for the 1st year anniversary of Blue Archive International Server, and it comes with English lyrics. The song is used both inside and outside the game.
